data.description:
Society has invested decades into building a system that considers it a crime to have been born male, simply because it is an actual minority group that has succeeded where the majority has faltered. Misandry has gone from being indicative of a mental health problem, to being celebrated as an alternate truth - shaming men for how they think, how they build, how they reproduce, how they speak, how they donate to charities and even how they sit on benches.

We are just a support group to help rebuild your shattered self-esteem, to listen to your complaints sympathetically even if they are not based on "the current science of 2020", and to remind you...it's okay to be male.
data.description_html:
Society has invested decades into building a system that considers it a crime to have been born male, simply because it is an actual minority group that has succeeded where the majority has faltered. Misandry has gone from being indicative of a mental health problem, to being celebrated as an alternate truth - shaming men for how they think, how they build, how they reproduce, how they speak, how they donate to charities and even how they sit on benches.

We are just a support group to help rebuild your shattered self-esteem, to listen to your complaints sympathetically even if they are not based on "the current science of 2020", and to remind you...it's okay to be male.
data.name: ItsOkayToBeMale

data.description:
Online resources and tools to help you improve yourself, and continue life-long learning.

Rules:
1. This is an area to share knowledge, not opinions or pseudoscience.
2. Low quality, paid, or ideological/political content will be removed. 
3. Treat each other kindly. Ignorance is the root of all evil.

Looking for high-quality non-political Guilds? See +GuildsOfSubstance, a growing list of worthwhile Ruqqus non-political Guilds.

data.description: Photos of stunning buildings and architecture. Please don't post concepts, renders and CGI: That is not real (yet) and you might as well post sci-fi in most cases. If you like this format, also check out: * +Landscapes * +Interiors * +Infrastructure * +Artifacts * +Paintings * +Illustrations * +Organisms * +Humans * +Raining * +SpacePictures * +GamingPhotography * +AnimeArt Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
data.description_html:
Photos of stunning buildings and architecture. Please don't post concepts, renders and CGI: That is not real (yet) and you might as well post sci-fi in most cases.

If you like this format, also check out:

  • +Landscapes

data.description:
A guild to discuss and appreciate mythology and other types of folklore.

Rules:

1. Don‚Äôt break Ruqqus TOS (a given)

2. Provide sources referencing the subject you‚Äôre talking about so that others may learn about it

3. Mythology and Folklore from all cultures allowed. It's fun to learn about mythology and mythological creatures from all over the world!

4. No politics, this is an apolitical guild
data.description_html:
A guild to discuss and appreciate mythology and other types of folklore.

  4. No politics, this is an apolitical guild
